contents.sentence:
Was the location of longitudinal joints in accordance with the following:
(a) Longitudinal joints in the surface shall be at the lane lines of the pavement.
(b) Longitudinal joints below the surface shall be offset from previously constructed joints by approximately 6 in. and be located within 12 in. of the lane line.
To make the joint more resistant to infiltration of water and allow for better compaction of the material placed in subsequent courses at the joint
